alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 1:19PM MST until July 31 at 1:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 145 PM MST. * At 118 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument, or 17 miles north of Flagstaff, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument, Bonito Campground At Sunset Crater, Wupatki National Monument, and Sunset Crater Visitors Center. This includes U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 430 and 442. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
